verses.verse: Israel <S%H3478><s%> is an <S%H1238>empty<s%> <S%H1612>vine,<s%> he bringeth <S%H7737>forth<s%> <S%H6529>fruit<s%> unto himself: according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H6529>fruit<s%> he hath <S%H7235>increased<s%> the <S%H4196>altars;<s%> according to the <S%H2896>goodness<s%> of his <S%H776>land<s%> they have made <S%H3190>goodly<s%> <S%H4676>images.<s%>

Their <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H2505>divided;<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> shall they be found <S%H816>faulty:<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall break <S%H6202>down<s%> their <S%H4196>altars,<s%> he shall <S%H7703>spoil<s%> their <S%H4676>images.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> they shall <S%H559>say,<s%> We have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> we <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> then should a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to us?

They have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H422>swearing<s%> <S%H7723>falsely<s%> in <S%H3772>making<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant:<s%> thus <S%H4941>judgment<s%> springeth <S%H6524>up<s%> as <S%H7219>hemlock<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H8525>furrows<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

The <S%H7934>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> shall <S%H1481>fear<s%> because of the <S%H5697>calves<s%> of <S%H1007>Beth-aven:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> thereof shall <S%H56>mourn<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> it, and the <S%H3649>priests<s%> thereof that <S%H1523>rejoiced<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> it, <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> thereof, <S%H3588>because<s%> it is <S%H1540>departed<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> it.

It shall be <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H2986>carried<s%> unto <S%H804>Assyria<s%> for a <S%H4503>present<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3377>Jareb:<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H1317>shame,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of his own <S%H4480>counsel.<s%> <S%H6098><s%>
As for <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> her <S%H4428>king<s%> is cut <S%H1820>off<s%> as the <S%H7110>foam<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H4325>water.<s%>

The high <S%H1116>places<s%> also of <S%H206>Aven,<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> shall be <S%H8045>destroyed:<s%> the <S%H6975>thorn<s%> and the <S%H1863>thistle<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> their <S%H4196>altars;<s%> and they shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> <S%H3680>Cover<s%> us; and to the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> <S%H5307>Fall<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> us.

O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> thou hast <S%H2398>sinned<s%> from the <S%H4480>days<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H5975>stood:<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5932>iniquity<s%> did <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5381>overtake<s%> them.

It is in my <S%H185>desire<s%> that I should <S%H3256>chastise<s%> them; and the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them, when they shall <S%H631>bind<s%> themselves in their <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5869>furrows.<s%>

And <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is as a <S%H5697>heifer<s%> that is <S%H3925>taught,<s%> and <S%H157>loveth<s%> to tread <S%H1758>out<s%> the corn; but <S%H589>I<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> her <S%H2898>fair<s%> <S%H6677>neck:<s%> I will make <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> to <S%H7392>ride;<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H2790>plow,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall break his <S%H7702>clods.<s%>

Sow <S%H2232><s%> to yourselves in <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> <S%H7114>reap<s%> <S%H6310>in<s%> <S%H2617>mercy;<s%> break <S%H5214>up<s%> your fallow <S%H5215>ground:<s%> for it is <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> he <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3384>rain<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> upon you.

Ye have <S%H2790>plowed<s%> <S%H7562>wickedness,<s%> ye have <S%H7114>reaped<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity;<s%> ye have <S%H398>eaten<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of <S%H3585>lies:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> thou didst <S%H982>trust<s%> in thy <S%H1870>way,<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy mighty <S%H1368>men.<s%>

Therefore shall a <S%H7588>tumult<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%> among thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H4013>fortresses<s%> shall be <S%H7703>spoiled,<s%> as <S%H8020>Shalman<s%> <S%H7701>spoiled<s%> <S%H1009>Beth-arbel<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4421>battle:<s%> the <S%H517>mother<s%> was dashed in <S%H7376>pieces<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> her <S%H1121>children.<s%>

So <S%H3602><s%> shall <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> unto you <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of your great <S%H7451>wickedness:<s%> <S%H7451><s%> in a <S%H7837>morning<s%> shall the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> utterly be cut <S%H1820>off.<s%> <S%H1820><s%>
